mapper.select: SELECT * FROM score_search_show WHERE coinid < 0 AND issuecode < 0 AND flag=0 ORDER BY scoredate DESC,coinid DESC LIMIT 0,3

SELECT * FROM (SELECT coinid, coinname, coinnum, onehundred, ninetynine, ninetyeight, ninetyseven, ninetysix, ninetyfivedesc, scoretime, flag, scoredate, issuecode FROM score_search_show WHERE issuecode > - 1 AND flag=0 ORDER BY scoretime DESC, coinnum DESC) b ORDER BY coinname DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO score_search ( coinid, coinname, coinnum, onehundred, ninetynine, ninetyeight, ninetyseven, ninetysix, ninetyfivedesc, scoretime, flag, scoredate, issuecode ) SELECT -1, '现代贵金属纪念币', COUNT(*) c, SUM( CASE WHEN score = 100 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) 100分, SUM( CASE WHEN score = 99 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) 99分, SUM( CASE WHEN score = 98 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) 98分, SUM( CASE WHEN score = 97 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) 97分, SUM( CASE WHEN score = 96 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) 96分, SUM( CASE WHEN score BETWEEN 0 AND 95 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) "0-95分", NOW(), '0', CURDATE(), '-1' FROM request_coin rc LEFT JOIN coin c ON c.id = rc.coinid WHERE score IS NOT NULL AND score > - 1 AND score <= 100 AND c.issuecode IN (1,101)

INSERT INTO score_search ( coinid, coinname, coinnum, onehundred, ninetynine, ninetyeight, ninetyseven, ninetysix, ninetyfivedesc, scoretime, flag, scoredate, issuecode ) SELECT -2, '现代流通纪念币', COUNT(*) c, SUM( CASE WHEN score = 100 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) 100分, SUM( CASE WHEN score = 99 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) 99分, SUM( CASE WHEN score = 98 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) 98分, SUM( CASE WHEN score = 97 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) 97分, SUM( CASE WHEN score = 96 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) 96分, SUM( CASE WHEN score BETWEEN 0 AND 95 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) "0-95分", NOW(), '0', CURDATE(), '-1' FROM request_coin rc LEFT JOIN coin c ON c.id = rc.coinid WHERE score IS NOT NULL AND score > - 1 AND score <= 100 AND c.issuecode IN (3,103)

INSERT INTO score_search ( coinid, coinname, coinnum, onehundred, ninetynine, ninetyeight, ninetyseven, ninetysix, ninetyfivedesc, scoretime, flag, scoredate, issuecode ) SELECT -3, '纸钞', COUNT(*) c, SUM( CASE WHEN score = 100 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) 100分, SUM( CASE WHEN score = 99 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) 99分, SUM( CASE WHEN score = 98 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) 98分, SUM( CASE WHEN score = 97 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) 97分, SUM( CASE WHEN score = 96 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) 96分, SUM( CASE WHEN score BETWEEN 0 AND 95 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) "0-95分", NOW(), '0', CURDATE(), '-1' FROM request_coin rc LEFT JOIN request_main r ON r.id = rc.requestid WHERE score IS NOT NULL AND score > - 1 AND score <= 100 AND r.entitytype=2

INSERT INTO score_search ( coinid, coinname, coinnum, onehundred, ninetynine, ninetyeight, ninetyseven, ninetysix, ninetyfivedesc, scoretime, flag, scoredate, issuecode ) SELECT * FROM (SELECT coinid, ( CASE WHEN b.commonlysubject = '' THEN CONCAT(b.years, '年', b.concatname) WHEN b.commonlysubject IS NULL THEN CONCAT(b.years, '年', b.concatname) ELSE b.commonlysubject END ) AS coinname, COUNT(*) c, SUM( CASE WHEN score = 100 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "100 分", SUM( CASE WHEN score = 99 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "99 分", SUM( CASE WHEN score = 98 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "98 分", SUM( CASE WHEN score = 97 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "97 分", SUM( CASE WHEN score = 96 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "96 分", SUM( CASE WHEN score BETWEEN 0 AND 95 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) "0-95分", NOW(), '0', CURDATE(), b.issuecode FROM request_coin rc, request_main r, (SELECT * FROM (SELECT c.id, c.commonlysubject, c.issuecode, c.years, CONCAT( IFNULL(sc.shortname, ''), c.shortsubject, IFNULL(c.weightshow, ''), IFNULL(scm.shortname, ''), '币', CASE WHEN mquality = 2 THEN '（精制）' WHEN mquality = 3 THEN '（普样）' WHEN mquality = 4 THEN '（精样）' WHEN mquality = 5 THEN '（样本）' ELSE '' END ) AS concatname FROM coin c, sys_country sc, sys_coin_material scm WHERE c.country = sc.id AND scm.id = c.material) a UNION ALL SELECT id, commonlysubject, '0', years, CONCAT( shortsubject, IFNULL(facevaluedis, ''), IFNULL(wmk, '') ) AS concatname FROM sys_bill_basic_info) b WHERE r.id = rc.requestid AND b.id = rc.coinid AND score IS NOT NULL AND score > - 1 AND score <= 100 AND r.entitytype IN (1, 2) AND b.issuecode IN (0, 1, 101, 3, 103) GROUP BY coinid ORDER BY c DESC LIMIT 0, 30) d ORDER BY coinname DESC
